document.full_text: security fears at u.s. companies in mexico have increased over the past year, fueled by growing concern about the threat from drug cartels, a poll by the american chamber of commerce of mexico showed.
document.title: mexico security fears grow for u.s. firms: survey
lines_and_colors: security fears at u.s. companies in mexico have increased over the past year, fueled by growing concern about the threat from drug cartels, a poll by the american chamber of commerce of mexico showed.
